description:
Everlapse is a fast, fun way to share life with photos. Tell stories, make flip books, and play along with friends.

• Use Everlapse to create fun photo challenges for everyone to join. 
• Participate in contests from your favorite brands and causes. 
• Create albums with others to share life’s best moments.
• Make slideshows together with your friends and family.
• Build collections of pet photos, favorite cars, sunrises, and anything else you can photograph.

Here’s what people are saying about us:

"An addictive new collaborative flipbook sharing app." - Josh Constine of TechCrunch

"A signpost of how we are going to collaboratively create and consume media in the future." - Om Malik of GigaOm 

"We're obsessed." - the knot

We can’t wait to see what you create!

Reach out to us at feedback@everlapse.com with questions and comments.
releaseNotes: Welcome to 1.3. We've added a full-screen photo view to enhance viewing and sharing of individual images. Open the full-screen view to swipe through, share, and like photos in a clip.
